explains: v. 陪伴，陪同；伴随，与……一起发生；为……伴奏（或伴唱）；附带，补充
wordGroup: accompany with 伴随着，兼带着；陪…同行
accompany by 随行，伴奏；在…的陪同下

sentences.en: Ken agreed to accompany me on a trip to Africa.
sentences.cn: 肯同意陪我去非洲旅行。

sentences.en: Barron invited her to accompany him to the races.
sentences.cn: 巴伦邀请了她陪他去看比赛。

sentences.en: Government monitors will continue to accompany reporters.
sentences.cn: 政府监督员们将继续陪同记者们。
